recordLookups.name: Get_Assigned_Cable_Management_Pricing_Manager
recordLookups.label: Get Assigned Cable Management Pricing Manager

fields.name: disp_opp
fields.fieldText:
You cannot submit your Quote for review if it is not associated with an Opportunity.


Please click 'Close', attach your Quote to an Opportunity by updating the Opportunity field and then re-click the 'Submit for Review' Button

fields.name: disp_opp_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot submit your Quote for review if it is not associated with a Company.


Please click 'Close', attach your Quote to an Company by updating the Company field and then re-click the 'Submit for Review' Button
